name: dataTypes
body:
Datové typy určují, jakým způsobem se data uloží a zpracovávají v počítači.
Každý datový typ má vlastnosti a omezení, které určují, jakým způsobem se data chovají.

languages.name: python
languages.body:
x = False #boolean
x = "Hello World" #string
x = 20 #intiger
x = 20.5 #float
x = 1j #complex
x = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"] #list
x = ("apple", "banana", "cherry") #tuple
x = range(6) #range
x = {"name" : "John", "age" : 36} #dict
x = {"apple", "banana", "cherry"} #set
x = frozenset({"apple", "banana", "cherry"}) #frozenset
x = True #bool
x = b"Hello" #bytes
x = bytearray(5) #bytearray
x = memoryview(bytes(5)) #memoryview
x = None

languages.name: cpp
languages.body:
string x = "Hello";     // string
int x = 5;               // integer
float x = 5.99;     // floating point number
bool x = true;       // boolean
char x = 'D';         // character

languages.name: js
languages.body:
let x = "Yellow"; // string
let x = 16; // Numbers
let x = 7.5; // Numbers
let x = false; // boolean
const x = {firstName:"John", lastName:"Doe"}; // object
const x = ["Saab", "Volvo", "BMW"]; // array
const x = new Date("2022-03-25"); // date

languages.name: ts
languages.body:
let x = "Yellow"; // string
let x = 16; // Numbers
let x = 7.5; // Numbers
let x = false; // boolean
const x = {firstName:"John", lastName:"Doe"}; // object
const x = ["Saab", "Volvo", "BMW"]; // array
const x = new Date("2022-03-25"); // date

languages.name: java
languages.body:
String x = "Hello"; // string
int x = 5; // integer (whole number)
float x = 5.99f; // floating point number
boolean x = true; // boolean
char x = 'D'; // character

languages.name: cs
languages.body:
string x = "Hello"; // string
int x = 5; // integer (whole number)
float x = 5.99f; // floating point number
boolean x = true; // boolean
char x = 'D'; // character

languages.name: golang
languages.body:
var x string = "Hi!" // string
var x int = 5 // integer
var x float32 = 3.14  // floating point number
var x bool = true // boolean

languages.name: ruby
languages.body:
x = "Hello World" #string
x = 20 #intiger
x = 20.5 #float
x = 1j #complex
x = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"] #list
x = false # boolean
